/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking up towards the sky, giving a sense of grandeur to the scene. The street is lined with buildings on both sides, their facades adorned with red and white signs, adding a splash of color to the urban landscape. Cars are parked neatly along the side of the road, hinting at the hustle and bustle of city life. The sky above is a clear blue, providing a beautiful backdrop to the cityscape. In the distance, trees can be seen, adding a touch of nature to the urban environment.
